title: restructure codebase to test .jsp files
description:
Change the package layout so we can test .jsp files from our embedded jetty test.

check: http://www.nabble.com/restructure-webapp-code-so-we-can-easily-test-.jsp-td15987151.html

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
actually: one suggestion tweak to what was discussed in mail...

> : Ok, then let me revise my proposal to:
> :  /src/webapp/java/(all java classes)
> :  /src/webapp/web/index.jsp
> :  /src/webapp/web/admin/...
> :  /src/webapp/web/WEB-INF/...
>

...let's just leave the path "src/webapps/src" alone (don't rename to src/webapp/java)  renaming that isn't neccessary to accomplish the goal, and could confuse some people (particularly if they already have IDEs setup to point at that directory)
